<h1>Reborn CMS</h1>
<h2>About Reborn CMS</h2>
<p>Reborn CMS is lightweight and open source Content Management System. Reborn base on MVC (Model View Controller) structure and Modular System. Reborn is created and maintain by Myanmar Links Professional Web Development</p>
<img src="data:image/png;base64,">

<h3>Requirements</h3>
<ol>
	<li>PHP Version 5.3.4 or greater</li>
    <li>MySQL Version 5.x or greater</li>
    <li>Web Server - Apache running on *nix platform</li>
    <li>apache mod_rewrite - To remove the index.php from the URL and beautiful URI</li>
    <li>PHP cURL Extension</li>
</ol>
